channel.title: Guideline on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Guideline on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Design less, present more with Deckset
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Do you ever feel overwhelmed by the myriad of design tools and options in PowerPoint, or the countless books and tutorials dedicated to beautifying a single sentence on a 100-inch screen?

item.title: Design less, present more with Deckset
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Do you ever feel overwhelmed by the myriad of design tools and options in PowerPoint, or the countless books and tutorials dedicated to beautifying a single sentence on a 100-inch screen?

item.title: Level Up Your Markdown Memos: Avoiding Common Pitfalls
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Markdown uses symbols and stuff to make your text look fancy. It’s like learning a new skill, game, or design program - there will be bumps in the road before you’re a pro.

item.title: How to set up environment to edit memo
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Set up SSH key SSH key is a secure authentication method which includes a public key and a private key.

item.title: How to set up cryto wallet to withdraw ICY
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: To withdraw ICY to Vietnam Bank or other fiat, you need set up 2 types of wallet in advance. On-chain wallet (Non-custodial wallet, such as: Coinbase, Metamask): This kind of wallet is needed to receive ICY and swap ICY to USDT.

item.title: How To Take A Nice Screenshot
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)

item.title: How To Take Better Screenshots On Mac
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: I grab screenshots pretty often. Although macOS’s native screenshot tool is decent for most cases, it’s still a very basic one.

item.title: How to withdraw ICY
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Before you can withdraw ICY, please make sure that you have already had the crypto wallet and Binance wallet. If you don’t have any, please follow this guideline.

item.title: How to push content on memo.d.foundation
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Before edit or create a new post Before you can create a new post, please make sure that you have finished setting up the environment for editting memo in this post, and you have the right access and edit the repository note.

item.title: Estimation Guidelines
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: When we conduct an estimation, it is recommended to abandon the transitional “exact hours” assessment method, instead, use the story point based on the Fibonacci number (1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13, 21…).

item.title: aarrr
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: AARRR framework We use the AARRR framework to measure and optimize every phase of a product by optimizing it through the insane focus on one metric at a time.

item.title: design-sprint
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Design Sprint What is the design sprint? The sprint is a four-day process for answering critical business questions through design, prototyping and testing ideas with customers.

item.title: fbsc
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Budget We do need to know clients’ budgets. This is often uncomfortable for them but their budget helps determines what scope is possible.

item.title: prototype
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Low-fidelity prototype: UI Design Research 1. Understand prospect Understanding stakeholder, company, business model, goals and challenges of the product in order to set mindset, define style, color palette, and typography, iconography, illustration, and photography.

item.title: Sharing
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Sharing At Dwarves Foundation, we believe that sharing is an important part of our culture. We share almost everything: every week, a lot of events are open to the public, and some of them are recorded so that anyone can watch the videos to learn.

item.title: Security Rules
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Basic Security Keeping laptops and phones secure is vitally important. We’re a software company and many of us have access to secure systems (both our own and our customers).

item.title: Conduct A Meeting
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Meeting has always played an integral part in every corporate office. To optimize a productive meeting, it is vital to conduct individuals gathering without wasting time and directly get to the point, to deliver new information or discuss crucial issues.
